description: A sensational vegetarian dinner loaded with greens, crispy tofu and crunchy radish. This sweet potato dish with sriracha will knock your socks off.
keywords: Sweet Potato & Crispy Tofu With Sriracha Dressing
name: Sweet Potato & Crispy Tofu With Sriracha Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide sweet potato, broccolini, tofu, radish and cucumber among plates. Drizzle with dressing and serve sprinkled with onion.
